title: Neurological examination of the full term neonate
brief_description: Intended primarily for doctors, shows in detail the system of examination devised by Dr. Neil O’Doherty to evaluate the responses of full-term newly born babies to seventeen groups of tests of their tactile, motor, auditory and visual behaviours.
